EmailTemplate.name: 2019.10.25 - SUB - Halloween Promo.SUB- Halloween Promo
EmailTemplate.subject: Here’s A Treat Today, Get $10 OFF!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
No tricks just treats today! Get $10 OFF your purchase of $75 or more! Valid until Nov. 2, 2019.
Use code 19HLWN10 at checkout.
Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions]]> or call 1 866 391‑8111 for details. © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited
